About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hello, world! My name is Jaimie. I am 30 years old, and for the past 4 - 5 years I have been living in China and teaching English to kindergarten aged students. I love my job, and my life in China. But I don't see either as a permanent situation. So! I decided to teach myself to code in the hopes of changing careers when I move back to Scotland in the near future. At this point in time, I have been working on learning HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Sass and Bootstrap. I've used a whole combination of courses and resources. My plan is to join the CodeClan bootcamp for Software Development when I return to Scotland, but in the meantime I will try my best to learn what I can on my own while blogging about it all here.
